Welcome to Nythop

Ready to experience Python in reverse? Nythop is here to revolutionize your coding experience by turning Python on its head â€“ literally. Every line is written backwards, making your code uniquely unreadable!

Why choose Nythop?

  • No more indentation wars - they're at the end of the line!
  • Comments read from right to left
  • Perfectly unreadable code, just as any good esolang should be
  • All the confusion of Python, none of the clarity

Learn more about Nythop in the package page
